name: Toy Dodgeball Battle Arena
description:
• Only one Toy can stand on a block at a time (don't step on other colors).
  • You have a ball as a weapon. Use it to throw enemies to their dooms.
  • You'll respawn 3 seconds after being killed.
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • CTRL to shoot
  • R to restart
  • ESC to quit

Made by: Barbara Ueki - 2D Art Braian Correa - 3D Art Felipe Oliveira - Music Vagner - Programming

P.S.: The game is intented for multiplayer, and there wasn't enough time to implement that or a proper AI. Hope you can get the idea.

Have fun!
:)
